item.title: RPZ Update: Community Engagement and Timeline
item.description: Glasgow City Council confirms design modifications are nearing completion for the Restricted Parking Zone (RPZ) in Broomhill, with community engagement to include both online feedback and an in-person exhibition.

item.title: An update on the Restricted Parking Zone
item.description: Update on RPZ meeting with Council

item.title: Pre-RPZ Parking Survey Analysis
item.description: A restricted parking zone will be introduced by Glasgow City Council in 2024/25 read for our analysis of the latest parking survey

item.title: Active Travel and Bus Proposals
item.description: In April 2022 community council made a submission with proposals to NRS about overhauling the cycle path on Crow road. In Summer 2023 we had a site visit with Council officers about improving cycle lanes and bus boarders.

item.title: Broomhill Community Council Proposals to Glasgow City Council on Roads ahead of the introduction of RPZ
item.description: In April 2022 the community council made a submission with proposals to Glasgow city council about how our neighbourhood could be reshaped during the RPZ road layout redesign.

item.title: Proposals for Junction at Crow Rd and Marlborough Av
item.description: In April 2022 the community council made a Submission to Glagow City Council regarding Junction of Marlborough Avenue and Crow Rd
